sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_d9a2bd91838b06100e57a8d0deaad39b
sys_update_xml.payload:

var session = gs.getSession(); var token = session.getSessionToken(); if (token=='' || token==undefined) token = gs.getSessionToken();

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_d0503111838b06100e57a8d0deaad378
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>React Resources</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var log = "[React APP Resources]";
    var fileName = request.pathParams.file;
	log += "\nFILE NAME: " + fileName;
    var currentRecord = "d0503111838b06100e57a8d0deaad378";
    var ar = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    ar.addQuery('table_sys_id', currentRecord);
    ar.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
    ar.query();
    if (ar.next()) {
		log +=  "\nATTACHMENT NAME: " + ar.file_name;
        var message = new GlideSysAttachment().getContent(ar);
        if (fileName.indexOf('.js') > 0) response.setContentType('text/javascript');
        else response.setContentType('text/css');
        response.setStatus(200);
        response.getStreamWriter().writeString(message);
    } else {
        return "file not found";
    }

	gs.info(log);

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_314547_react_app/react_application_api/{file}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{file}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-26 12:59:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>d0503111838b06100e57a8d0deaad378</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>React Resources</sys_name><sys_package display_value="React Application" source="x_314547_react_app">8f5c09d5838bc2100e57a8d0deaad323</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="React Application">8f5c09d5838bc2100e57a8d0deaad323</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_d0503111838b06100e57a8d0deaad378</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-26 13:00:56</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="React Application API">8edfa5dd834b06100e57a8d0deaad37c</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
